outputs.output_descr: The project will implement a demonstration/pilot project for the construction of a sewage treatment plant in the Luyanó River area, identified as the main source of pollution to Havana Bay that will remove nitrogen and phosphorus. UNEP is responsible through CAR/RCU for sharing and disseminating project activities and nutrient pollution control strategies for the Wider Caribbean. The project supports the mandate of the Cartagena Convention for the Protection and Development of the Marine Environment of the Wider Caribbean Region, particularly Article 7, Pollution from Land-based Sources, and Article 13, Scientific and Technical Co-operation, as well as the Land-Based Sources Protocol.

project_descr: Demonstration of Innovative Approaches to the rehabilitation of heavily contaminated bays in the Wider Caribbean. PIMS 1443 IW FSP Cuba
project_title: REHABILITATION OF CARIBBEAN HEAVILY CONTAMINATED BAYS
